entity.entitySummary: Stores information about individuals and organizations who use plant taxon names.
entity.entityDescription: This table stores the name of the various parties considered important in the activity of correlating names with circumscriptions.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value corresponding to a unique party - which may be an individual or organization

attribute.attNotes: This attribute will be, in later versions, broken into multiple attributes including: address, telehone, email.
attribute.attDefinition: Stores the name of the organization or individual representing a "party".
